forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this morning, then becoming cloudy during the afternoon. High 11C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. High 52F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with some clearing expected late. Low 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Low 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and some clouds. High 14C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and some clouds. High 57F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 7C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low near 45F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 57F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low around 10C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 49F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thundershowers following a period of rain early. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain early. Showers with perhaps a rumble of thunder developing in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 6C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 43F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and a few thunderstorms likely. High around 10C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with showers and scattered thunderstorms. High 49F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low around 5C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 41F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 9C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 48F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 4C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low around 40F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 51F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low around 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 41F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 12C. E winds shifting to NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 53F. E winds shifting to NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low around 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low around 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 14C. E winds shifting to NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 56F. E winds shifting to NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds overnight. Low around 5C. Winds ENE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 41F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High around 15C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High around 60F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 7C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 44F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.
